profile:
A Glass Act has been providing window cleaning, Gutter cleaning, Gutter repairs, interior Painting, exterior Painting, drywall repairs, chandelier cleaning, pressure washing, power washing, house washing, building cleaning exterior, roof cleaning, roof de-mossing, roof moss control treatments, concrete & Paving stone sealing, post construction cleaning, pre-occupany cleaning and a variety of other building maintenance services in the Vancouver area since 1988. 

****

We are pleased to announce that effective July 1, 2015, all of our cleaning services are now available to residents and business' in the Victoria & the Saanich Peninsula area! 

****

COVID-19 STATEMENT

COVID-19 has been declared a pandemic. Federal, provincial and local governments and their agencies have been announcing daily recommendations and restrictions that affect the everyday lives of every Canadian.

Whereas the health authorities are still stating that the risk of contracting the virus is low to moderate in BC, the health and safety of our staff and customers is a paramount concern for us at A Glass Act Window Cleaners & Building Maintenance.

We would ask that customers postpone in booking any INTERIOR CLEANING appointments with us until such time that the major Canadian health authorities announce that it will be safer for us to be working indoors (in your homes) in a more contained proximity to our customers.  We will continue to provide our EXTERIOR CLEANING services at this time while following the very important social distancing regulations.

In addition, we are requiring our staff to self-isolate if they become ill or if someone in their household becomes ill.  We do look forward to providing you with our exterior Spring cleaning service, to get your home or business looking refreshed and clean for the season.  We know that many of you will be spending more time in your yards, gardens and patios this Spring while staying at home.  We look forward to making your building exteriors cleaner and brighter while we all stay safer and healthy at home!!

Thank you for your understanding and support.

Kirby Koochin
(President)
A Glass Act Window Cleaners and Building Maintenance Ltd.

profile:
Gutter Cleaning is the most important part of the property maintenance program. And unfortunately, 95% of gutters installed around Vancouver designed very poorly, so gutter cleaning alone wouldn't help much. 95% of the gutters have smallest opening possible to transfer water down into down pipe and then to the ground, or underground. Even worth, drainage capacity of those drainage opening reduced even more with filtering element, strainer, installed. Those strainers work on the same principal as a strainer in your kitchen sink. How often do you clean your kitchen sink strainer? Most likely after each use, or as soon as it gets plugged. But somehow, a lot of people think that strainer in the gutter should be checked once a year, or once in a couple of years. At the same time, plugged kitchen sink doesn't lead to expensive repairs, or even health hazards for your family members.(Think of mold inside of your walls). And all those hazards are easier to prevent then to find.
You can spend a lot of money on getting the most efficient gutters and gutter protection systems, and there are a lot of companies that will happily sell those systems for you. And don't get us wrong. After spending $4 000 - $12 000 you might get generally an effective system, but do you think it would be just an overkill? Some times, $200 - $600 of repairs and modification would make your gutter system EFFICIENT ENOUGH! So your existing gutters would be able to effectively manage collected rain water and divert it away from the roof, walls, even your garden!
And remember, (and unfortunately, we see it too often), when insurance companies called to assess water damages, only to find out that plugged gutters are to blame for those damages, insurance wouldn't cover repairs, because that considered to be homeowners fault, not maintaining gutters properly, and for not doing gutter cleaning often enough. And in fact, making it a homeowner fault that their gutters are poorly designed and as a results, can't handle the rains and amounts of rain water we get and gutter cleaning should be done more often.
Do you want that risk? It's like a lottery backwards. Would you end up with huge bill for water damage repair, after spending all those money for your property insurance? Or YOU will get spared?
Call us today at 604 349 7506 for a free estimation for your gutter cleaning r inspection and we would tell you if you part of that lottery or not.
We would love to help you with any of your gutter problems, or any exterior cleaning needs.
Gutter cleaning, gutter repairs, roof moss removal, pressure washing and soft wash for siding of your property, we do it all.

profile:
Martinez Property Services is dedicated to make home owners proud of their property by delivering quality work.

Our safety conscious technicians are trained to take good care of your property and give you a peace of mind.

 
Your property is something that you should be able to take real pride in. However, that can be hard when things are unclean and generally not well maintained.

Property maintenance Surrey BC can take a real time commitment, and we know that’s not always something that you can do. As a result, it’s often not long before certain parts of your property start to look a little worse for wear.

With our professional range of property services, you can make sure that everything gets done around your property. We offer a service that can take care of all cleaning and work that any property requires, whether it’s a residential or commercial one.

So, don’t let things get out of hand because you don’t have time. Our service is here to take care of it all for you and make sure that your property is well maintained and effectively looked after.

 

With our service, looking after your property is so much easier. As part of our service, we can do all the general work and maintenance that all properties require.

Our team can help clean out your gutters, clean your roof and even your windows. Along with this, we also offered a selection of more specialised services, which includes pressure washing, moss removal and treatment services, as well as high rise window cleaning.

The services that we provide are available for both residential and commercial properties. So, make sure that everything gets done with our easy to organise and affordable service.

profile:
Welcome to Buhler Painting Ltd!
Buhler Painting is committed to managing our projects with integrity and attention to detail. We have experience in painting homes, new residential projects, commercial properties and businesses with excellence!

Buhler Painting Ltd is a full-service painting company located in Abbotsford, British Columbia servicing Vancouver and the entire Fraser Valley.  When the company was founded in 2006, we quickly realized that by taking care of our clients, offering fair prices, and delivering what we promised on time, people wanted to do business with us. This foundation of Buhler Painting has allowed us to work with hundreds of clients over the years.

Thanks to our remarkable clients who have referred us to others, we have grown to be a reputable and reliable painting company known for our fair prices, quality work, and reliable staff-a reputation known throughout the Lower Mainland.

We finish with distinction - Quality workmanship you can trust

If you have any questions, or would like to book a quote, please do not hesitate in contacting our Project Coordinator, Karen Denevers at 604-855-1042.

We appreciate your time in viewing our galleries and considering Buhler Painting for your next residential or commercial project.
